instructions:
1. Click the button "Download or Claim" before the offer expires.
2. Login into your itch.io account to access the game.

title: Heroes And Generals Starter Pack Key Giveaway
description: Claim your Heroes And Generals Starter Pack Key and unlock weapons, ammo, boosters, and more when you enter the battlefield.
instructions:
1. Login and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: World Of Warships Godzilla vs. Kong Supply Drop Key
description: Claim your free World Of Warships Godzilla vs. Kong Supply Drop key! Each Supply Drop key unlocks 10 of each themed Monster camouflages.
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the butto to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: World of Warships: HUGE BONUSES Code
description:
This is the best time to jump into World of Warships! Claim the code below and unlock HUGE BONUSES including 2,5 million credits, 200 doubloons, 7 days of premium, 2 cruisers (St. Louis and Emden) plus 20X camouflage restless fire! It's crazy! Please note this code is for new players only.

Code: BOOM
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the World of Warships page.
2. Click the button and enter your new account details.
3. On the sign up page, click the "Have an invite code?" link and insert the code if not there already. (The code should be added automatically if you followed our link) That's it!

title: Magic: The Gathering Arena - 5 Card Sleeves
description:
Use the codes below and unlock 5 Card Sleeves for Magic: The Gathering Arena!

Codes:
DebateDuelists - (Silverquill Sleeve)
MathWhizzes - (Quandrix Sleeve)
SwampPunks - (Witherbloom Sleeve)
ArtClub - (Prismari Sleeve)
RockJocks - (Lorehold Sleeve)
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" to visit the game page and create your account if you don't have one.
2. Start the game and on the home screen click Store
3. In the top right corner, click "Redeem Code" window.
4. Enter the code there. Be careful to correctly use uppercase and lowercase

title: Free MTG: Arena Codes
description:
Below you will find all the free Magic: The Gathering Arena Codes we found. Redeem all this Magic Arena codes and unlock Set Packs, XP, card styles and other rewards for free.

Codes:

PlayKaldheim (3 packs)
PlayZendikar (3 packs)
PlayM21 (3 packs)
FNMATHOME (1 pack)
PlayIkoria (3 packs)
PlayTheros (3 packs)
PlayRavnica (3 packs)
PlayAllegiance (3 packs)
PlayWarSpark (3 packs)
PlayM20 (3 packs)
PlayEldraine (3 packs)
TryKaladesh (1 pack)
SuperScry (1 card + card style)
ParallaxPotion (1 card + card style)
FoilFungus (1 card + card style)
ShinyGoblinPirate (1 card + card style)
SparkleDruid (1 card + card style)
OverTheMoon (1 card style)
InnerDemon (1 card style)
ShieldsUp (1 card style)
WrittenInStone (1 card style)
EnlightenMe (1 card style)
LevelUp (2000 XP)
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" to visit the game page and create your account if you don't have one.
2. Start the game and on the home screen click Store
3. In the top right corner, click "Redeem Code" window.
4. Enter the code there. Be careful to correctly use uppercase and lowercase

title: DRAG: Special Event Key Giveaway
description: Claim your DRAG: Special Event Key to unlock the Special Event Racetrack Zone-A 5 event! Plus you can use this code on the demo!
instructions:
1. Log in into your Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: World of Tanks: 600 Gold + Tank Invite Code
description: Claim this free World of Tanks invite code and unlock a Tank T-1271 or a Tank M22 Locust plus 600 Gold without any cost! You just need to follow the instructions below! Please note this invite codes are for new players only!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Loot" button to visit the World of Tanks page and activate the code automatically.
2. Click the button and enter your new account details.
3. That's it, the bonus will be added to your account automatically.

title: Two Point Hospital: SEGA 60th Items DLC
description: Claim your Two Point Hospital: SEGA 60th Items DLC on Steam for free! Please note the base game Two Point Hospital is required to enjoy this DLC content.
instructions:
1. Install the base game Two Point Hospital first.
2. Download the DLC on Steam.

title: Causa, Voices of the Dusk Game Packs Bundle Keys
description: Claim your Causa, Voices of the Dusk Game Packs Bundle Key and unlock 7 Card Packs and 1 Premium Card Back!
instructions:
1. Login into your Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: Neverwinter Avernus: Gift of the Noble Guard Key Giveaway
description: Claim your Neverwinter Avernus: Gift of the Noble Guard Pack Key and unlock free in-game items for Neverwinter (PC) including the Cape of the Noble Guard, Stone of Health and more!
instructions:
1. Login into your Alienwarearena account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: Free Bomb Bots Arena Gift Pack Keys
description:
Claim your Bomb Bots Arena exclusive gift pack key and unlock in-game items for Bomb Bots Arena (on PC, Android and iOS)! Each pack key includes a head, body and a hat!

*Please note these are not Steam keys, if you pick the Steam version please follow the instructions and redeem the key inside the game.
instructions:
1. Login and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: SUPER CIRCUIT BREAKERS - PAYNE
description: Grab this DLC for FREE until the end of May! Please note the base game is required (free to play) to play this DLC content.
instructions:
1. Download the base game on Steam first (free to play)
2. Install the DLC before the offer expires.

title: Payday 2: Free In-game Items Giveaway
description: OVERKILL is giving away free in-game items for Payday 2! You just need to complete some easy steps to unlock several in-game items including masks, hats and more!
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Select your favorite in-game items.
3. Complete the steps to unlock your in-game items!

title: Collective Free Hero Skin Key
description: Grab your Collective Hero Skin key now before it's too late!
instructions:
1. Login into your Alienwarearena account, scroll down and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Follow the giveaway instructions to redeem your key.

title: Dream of Mirror Online Summer Fun DLC Pack Steam Keys
description: Claim your Dream of Mirror Online Summer Fun DLC Pack Steam Key and unlock lots of in-game items for Dream of Mirror Online. Please note the base game Dream Of Mirror Online (free to play) is required to play this DLC content.
instructions:
1. Login into your Alienware account.
2. Click the button to unlock your Steam Key.
3. Redeem your key on Steam.

title: Overstep Skin Key Giveaway
description: Grab this key and unlock an exclusive skin for Overstep! Please note you must redeem this key in-game.
instructions:
1. Download and install Overstep on Steam for free.
2. Login into your Alienwarearena account and grab your key.
3. Open the game and click on the main menu and enter the code.

title: Brawlhalla Katars of the Raven Weapon Skin Codes
description: Follow Brawlhalla on Twitch and score a free Katars of the Raven Weapon Skin code! To redeem your code, go to the Brawlhalla in-game store, then type your code into "Redeem Code" at the bottom.
instructions:
1. Complete all steps to unlock your key.
2. Go to the Brawlhalla in-game store, then type your code into "Redeem Code" at the bottom.
platforms: PC, Playstation 4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch

title: Free Rocket League Codes
description:
Rocket League is giving away free in-game items, to unlock those items you just need to use the codes below. Please note the base game is required to play this DLC content.

Active Codes:
popcorn

This codes will expire soon so redeem the code now!
instructions:
1. Launch Rocket League (Via Steam, XB1 or PS4)
2. Go to "Extras"; in the Main Menu and select "Redeem Code" then enter the code: popcorn.

title: Destiny 2: Free Emblem Codes
description:
Score free in-game Emblems for Destiny 2! You just need to redeem the codes bellow. Best of all, it's free! If anyone knows other Emblem codes, please feel free to share them! Please note that emblem codes probably have an expiration date, and will not work once expired

2. That's it! Have fun!

title: Farming Simulator 2017: Free Horsch Agrovation DLC
description:
Grab this Horsch Agrovation DLC Code for Farming Simulator 2017. On the Farming Simulator 2017 page, just paste the following key code into the field provided: 143208267411

You will receive a link to the Horsch Agrovation DLC released during Agritechnica event. It is a 1.1GB download that gives you a .exe file.
instructions: 1.  Just paste the following key code into the field provided: 143208267411
